name: Dodge the Swarm!
description:
A swarm of strange spiderlike robots takes over downtown suddenly. Dodge the horde of strange autotapers for as long as you can, then get cozy and hope help arrives soon!

Just a small game made in Godot to learn the engine and practice my sprite art. Enjoy!

Credits

  • Sprite art by Luozcuridad
  • Gameplay script by Godot Docs
  • Hit stop script by Master Albert
  • Silly Party a GO GO from Nisekaijuutaku arranged by Spelunker
  • Platformer SFX by David Stearns
  • Humble Fonts - Gold Compass by somepx
  • Featuring camoes from several DA users.
